plugins.name: ccai
plugins.description: Automatically identify tool-intensive tasks with clear boundaries and delegate them to cost-efficient AI providers for execution. Triggers on batch operations (WebFetch, Read, Write, Edit, Bash, MCP, etc.), data processing, code generation, code analysis, and web scraping tasks, chrome-devtools-mcp tasks.

plugins.name: glm
plugins.description: GLM-4.6 AI provider plugin for cost-efficient task delegation. Includes /glm slash command and system prompt for executing tool-intensive tasks.

plugins.name: minimax
plugins.description: MiniMax AI provider plugin for cost-efficient task delegation. Includes /minimax slash command and system prompt for executing tool-intensive tasks.
